PHRASE.LANG: This outfit will make you feel like nothing less than a king. Bundle includes top, bottom, shoes, crown, and sceptre. [#Legal]
Avec ce costume, c'est vous le roi ! Le pack comprend : un haut, un pantalon, des chaussures, une couronne et un sceptre. [#Legal]
In diesem Outfit fühlt sich der Träger wie ein König. [#Legal]
Questo costume ti farà sentire un vero re. Il pacchetto comprende busto, pantaloni, scarpe, corona e scettro. [#Legal]
Con este conjunto te sentirás como un rey. El conjunto comprende parte superior, parte inferior, zapatos, corona y cetro. [#Legal]
왕의 근엄함을 직접 느낄 수 있는 의상입니다. 이 세트는 헬멧, 상의, 하의, 장갑, 그리고 부츠를 포함합니다. [#Legal]
This outfit will make you feel like nothing less than a king. Bundle includes top, bottom, shoes, crown, and scepter. [#Legal]
這套套裝能讓你感到至高無上。本服裝組包括上身、下身、鞋、皇冠及權仗。[#Legal]
這套套裝能讓你感到至高無上。本服裝組包括上身、下身、鞋、皇冠及權仗。[#Legal]
This outfit will make you feel like nothing less than a king. Bundle includes top, bottom, shoes, crown, and scepter. [#Legal]
